title: Add account of Estonia as exemplar to The Lost Dao chapter
description: While we devote much more time to the story of Taiwan, Estonia is a precedent and exemplar for Taiwan.  There is a place at the end of the chapter where this should be filled in, in a case study of about 1 page/2-3 paragraphs.  Ideally it should be tied to the history in the chapter, including to Henry George, given the heavy use of land taxes in Estonia, though primary focus should be on the role of technology.
